hours_text:
Location & Hours Location Icon

**Valene L. Smith Museum of Anthropology**  
Meriam Library, Room 180   
[530-898-5397](tel:530-898-5397)  
[anthromuseum@csuchico.edu](mailto:anthromuseum@csuchico.edu)

**Museum Hours :**  

**Academic Year**  
11 a.m – 3 p.m.   
Tuesday–Saturday 

**Summer (June & July only)**  
11 a.m. - 3 p.m.   
Tuesday–Saturday 

[More Contact Information](visit.shtml)

[](_assets/images/map.jpg)

The museum is located in the Meriam Library complex, across from the main library entrance.

accessibility_text:
#  Accessibility and Accommodations 

Chico State is committed to ensuring that accessibility and accommodations are a key aspect of our organization’s mission. Below is a list of our **disability-related resources**. For immediate help, try our [live chat](https://chat.csuchico.edu/).

## Common Requests

[](https://www.csuchico.edu/contact/change-request/?change=accessibility)

**[Report an accessibility issue](https://support.csuchico.edu/TDClient/1984/Portal/Requests/ServiceDet?ID=45100)**

Report an accessibility issue with a campus website.

[](https://www.csuchico.edu/arc/current-and-prospective-students/register.shtml)

**[Register with Accessibility Resource Center (ARC)](https://whitney.accessiblelearning.com/CSUChico/ApplicationStudent.aspx)**

For students to get accommodations related to accessibility.

* * *

## Campus Accessibility

[](https://www.csuchico.edu/arc/index.shtml)

**[Accessibility Resource Center (ARC)](https://www.csuchico.edu/arc/index.shtml)**

The best starting point for students and employees looking to receive accommodations from the University.

Location:  
Student Services Center, Room 170   
[530-898-5959 ](tel:530-898-5959 )  
[arcdept@csuchico.edu](mailto:arcdept@csuchico.edu)

[](https://support.csuchico.edu/TDClient/1984/Portal/Requests/ServiceCatalog?CategoryID=5535)

**[Accessible Technology Services](https://support.csuchico.edu/TDClient/1984/Portal/Requests/ServiceCatalog?CategoryID=5535)**

Technology-related help for students an...
